articles.title: Cricketer Shoaib Bashir’s Visa Problems Are Problems of Hindutva Politics - The Wire
articles.description: The simple reason behind this is the Hindutva politics – of discrimination, humiliation and subjugation of religious minorities, particularly Muslims and Christians from the territories that fall under their conception of Akhand Bharat.
articles.content: This is not the first time it has happened. And it will not be the last if the Modi government is in power. Shoaib Bashir, an English cricketer with parentage of Pakistani origins, was unable to secu… [+4802 chars]
